title: Looking for Tolstoi, Cycle, AB 460, Old Mill
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Looking for Tolstoi, Cycle, AB 460, Old Mill
posts.post_content:
Looking for some tougher Tolstois, Cycles, Old Mills, AB 460.  I'm only interested in certain front/back combos.  Some of these combos are pretty common and those are not the ones I am looking for.  Willing to pay a premium for scarcity.  Let me know what you have and I'll get back to you quickly with which cards I am interested in.  I can buy or trade.  Have around 300 cards that could be trade bait for things that interest me.  You can check out most of them here:  [url]http://stores.ebay.com/lukesvintagecards[/url]

Thanks for looking!

i have a very rare tolstoi... the infamous Luke Lyon Tolstoi 350 with red letterings...

haha
Not saying I don't believe you, but I'm going to need to see a scan.
I have a Walter Johnson (Pitching) Old mill. PM if interested.

I have: Cobb, Red, Tolstoi SGC 6, Wajo, Hands, Tolstoi SGC 6.5, Lajoie, Bat, Tolstoi SGC 5.5Wajo, Hands, Old Mill SGC 5, and McGraw, At Hip, AB 460 SGC 5.  I looked at your ebay postings and none are for me.  Not looking to sell, but would trade if you have some goodies not posted on Ebay that are interesting.  PM if interested.  Thanks

[quote name="Luke" post=1619199]Not saying I don't believe you, but I'm going to need to see a scan.[/QUOTE]

scanner is broken.... haha

I have the following Old Mills:
-Kaiser Wilhelm
-Jimmy Burke
-Admiral Schlei

just sent a pm.
all the best,
barry
